subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Johnny Damon wants to improve his Hall of Fame candidacy by reaching the 3,000-hit mark, the Yankees, who have not offered him a starting role, are unlikely to be the team he chooses.
snippet: If Johnny Damon wants to improve his Hall of Fame candidacy by reaching the 3,000-hit mark, the Yankees, who have not offered him a starting role, are unlikely to be the team he chooses.
